name: N-(omega)-Hydroxyarginine,NADPH:oxygen oxidoreductase (nitric-oxide-forming)
definition: NADPH + 2 N(omega)-Hydroxyarginine + 2 Oxygen + H+ <=> NADP+ + 2 Nitric oxide + 2 L-Citrulline + 2 H2O
comment: the latter part of multi-step reaction (see R00557, R00558+R00111) following after R00558 NADH (see R10108)
